body: I'm so sad this was never translated *cries*
How do i add tags? There are alot missing...

@lusterz

Looks like a group is going to pick up his latest tank, if this is a part of tank they will do it

@lusterz im not sure what the rules are here at nhentai, mao forgive me if this is forbidden.

However the main site for hentai, minus wani stuff, is exhentai.org

You need to register at e-hentai.org, wait a bit (a week or so), then modify your cookies, there are guides out there,

Or use exhentai easy plugin

Somehow, the girl looks similar to Tsutsumi Kinuka, from H-game 'Hizashi no Naka no Riaru'. Even the part when they fuck in the toilet seems directly lifted from the final chapter of the game! Is this supposed to be a fancomic?
@letmypeoplewatch4 can you elaborate what you mean by "fjords"?  Couldn't find anything with google.
lusterz check comments on fjords see if anyone has picked it up

This one is actually super dialogue heavy.. I'm going to do 'Sawaranu Loli ni Tatari Nashi' first. I don't have any previous experience with manga translation/rewriting dialogue/everything, so it probably won't be pro quality. Progress is alright though.. already removed all the dialogue from the pages (respect to people who do this in scanlation groups.. takes so long) and 4pages into translation.
lusterz, that will be so kind from your part C:
Is anyone doing a translation for this? I might give it a go if no one else is.
